title: Vampire Solstice
description: "It is enough for one of us to stand just anywhere and to unveil; and so as water floods most blindly down into a chasm, they will come to us, will hunger for us, will be drawn to us for we are what they always dreamed that they might be.Immortal, and beloved."For the Vampire community, the Solstice Choosing has been the holiest night of the year – for a hundred thousand years. But this year, something new is about to happen. The oldest prophecies are about to be fulfilled – could it be that the Festival of Blessings is finally upon us?
author: StarFields
